definition: medium-sized tropical marine food fishes that utter grunting sounds when caught, issue a grunting, low, animal-like noise
details:
noun
- medium-sized tropical marine food fishes that utter grunting sounds when caught
- the short low gruff noise of the kind made by hogs
= synonyms: oink
- an unskilled or low-ranking soldier or other worker
= example: an unskilled or low-ranking soldier or other worker
verb
- issue a grunting, low, animal-like noise
= example: issue a grunting, low, animal-like noise
